package.name: Net_Dig
package.summary: The PEAR::Net_Dig class should be a nice, friendly OO interface to the dig command
package.description: The PEAR::Net_Dig class should be a nice, friendly OO interface to the dig command

release.notes: This is the initial independent release of the Net_Dig package. Some of the code probably needs to be PEAR-ified a bit more.
